snippet: The Wall Street tycoon Sardar Biglari "certainly is a Warren Buffett disciple," an associate said. "The one thing that's quite different is that he's not a guy who's afraid of picking a fight."
abstract: The Wall Street tycoon Sardar Biglari "certainly is a Warren Buffett disciple," an associate said. "The one thing that's quite different is that he's not a guy who's afraid of picking a fight."

headline.main: Taking a Page From Buffett for His Own Path
